backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing player and game types with creation, scoring, and state-tracking logic using Maps, Lists, and queries.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report structure with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten file summaries describing various frontend configuration and UI files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining light/dark CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML root document loading the frontend React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal wrapper component that renders the LandingPage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching players and games and mutating creation endpoints with cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dartboard-inspired color variables and global typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint that mounts React with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: UI page displaying the projectâ€™s hero section, features, and structured informational layout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, custom colors, fonts, animations, and layout extensions.
project_state.json: Project state file describing backend requirements, architecture notes, issues, and feature requests for a dart scoring service.
